text: Reginald Greive "Reg" Withers (26 October 1924 â€“ 15 November 2014) was an Australian politician. He was the long-serving member of the Australian Senate. Withers served as Lord Mayor of Perth from 1991 through 1994. He was also known for being a harsh critic of Australian prime minister Gough Whitlam. Withers died in Perth, Western Australia, aged 90. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Australian mayors Category:Politicians from Western Australia
title: Reg Withers
